text: Reema Harrysingh-Carmona (born November 22, 1970 in Hoboken, New Jersey, United States) is an economist from Trinidad and Tobago, who was the First Lady of Trinidad and Tobago from 2013 until 2018. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from North America Category:1970 births Category:Trinidad and Tobago people Category:Economists Category:First Ladies Category:People from Hoboken, New Jersey Category:Living people
title: Reema Harrysingh-Carmona
